Dear student

You have an opportunity to receive information about your schedule, news, academic achievements and financial data in your personal account  “My BIA”.

To sign in a student portal “My BIA”, you need the following information:

Password - the number of the student's contract with the BIA, preceded by bsa- (dash) in capital letters (e.g.: bsa-RI0A0000)

LECTURE SHELDULE

The Baltic International Academy (BIA) stands as a prominent non-governmental institution of higher education within the Baltic States, originating in 1992. Recognized as an accredited Higher Educational Institution (HEI) in Latvia, our programs hold global recognition. Offering a spectrum of 26 study programs across 8 distinct directions, we cater to diverse educational pursuits.

Dear student! The class schedule is available on your personal account “My BIA” where you also have the opportunity to receive information  news, academic achievements and financial data.
To sign in a student portal (in test mode) “My BIA”, you need the following information: LOGIN – email; PASSWORD – bsa-number of student agreement with BIA in capital letters (eg: bsa-RI0A0000).
In case of any questions, please, contact your study programme director or our Information Centre via

+371 67 100 220
info.md@bsa.edu.lv

Feel free to ask anything about our college

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services.
